entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 06:21 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
